snippet: The America’s Cup defender Oracle Team USA sustained a devastating blow Tuesday when its 72-foot catamaran flipped over and broke to pieces in the churning waters of San Francisco Bay.
abstract: America’s Cup defender Oracle Team USA is set back when its 72-foot catamaran flips over and breaks to pieces while training in San Francisco Bay.
lead_paragraph: The America’s Cup defender Oracle Team USA sustained a devastating blow Tuesday when its 72-foot catamaran flipped over and broke to pieces in the churning waters of San Francisco Bay.

headline.seo: Oracle Boat Being Tested for America’s Cup Capsizes
headline.main: Oracle Boat Being Tested for America’s Cup Capsizes
headline.print_headline: Oracle Boat Being Tested for America’s Cup Capsizes
